title: The Exception: an eternal kiss
description: Doyle's accepted his lot in life as a vampire, but he wouldn't wish it on another living soul. Especially not his lover, Allyce, but when posed with the challenge of damning her to a life he hated or death by the hands of the elders? Jackson, his best friend left Doyle little to no choice: he must work with him to create a plan, hunt the love of his life, and deliver “The Exception, an eternal kiss”.This book is intended for adults only, and contains mature adult themes of fantasy, vampires, sex, and implied mind control.
author: Penelope  Jones
